item.title: Store your users across multiple tenants
item.description: Store your users across multiple tenants Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Existing doc: changes are needed to update the doc and to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal application builders, Saas Builder Changes to be made: Change title, move definitions and theory of tenants and multi-tenants to Learn > OIDC > Tenants. This page is purely about helping the reader to understand and choose between the different ways to implement multi-tenant apps.

item.title: Plan your LCM integration
item.description: Plan your lifecycle management application build Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Existing doc: changes are needed to update the doc and to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal application builders, Saas Builder Changes to be made: For best effect, it makes sense to rework these articles to match “Plan your web application build” - i.e., to have a How-To \ Guide Hub style article that runs through the entire process of building a lifecycle-aware app.
